meanings.definition: A young and attractive girl, especially one who is sexually precocious.
meanings.sent1: The nymphette giggled with her friends at the school dance.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrayed the character as a typical nymphette, always catching the attention of boys.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nymphette convinced her friends to skip class and go on an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her innocent appearance masked the inner nymphette who craved excitement and danger.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant nymphette danced through life, leaving a trail of admirers in her wake.

meanings.definition: A sexually attractive young woman or girl.
meanings.sent1: The magazine cover featured a sultry nymphette in a red dress.
meanings.sent2: The actress was often cast in roles that highlighted her allure as a nymphette.
meanings.sent3: The beach was filled with nymphettes soaking up the sun and turning heads.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence and charm made her the ultimate nymphette in the eyes of many.
meanings.sent5: The party buzzed with excitement as the nymphette made her grand entrance.
